item.description: workflow_things Mostly made to send a link when people ask about things I’ve found to improve my workflow tools fzf nvim nc oh my zsh jq bspwm sxhkd sshuttle rust alacritty unibar zshrc # alias when you know the filter for speed alias lq='function _lq() { logcli query -t -q --include-label=line '{NOMAD_JOB_NAME='\"${1}\"'}' };_lq'` # alias for when you want interactive search - requires fzf alias lql='function _lql() { logcli query -t -q --include-label=line '{NOMAD_JOB_NAME='\"$(logcli labels NOMAD_JOB_NAME | fzf --s ync)\"'}' };_lql' #bind key to open on ctrl+l lqll() { logcli query -t -q --include-label=line '{NOMAD_JOB_NAME='\"$(logcli labels NOMAD_JOB_NAME | fzf --sync)\"'}' } zle -N lqll bindkey ^l lqll alias watch='watch ' if command -v tmux &> /dev/null && [ -n "$PS1" ] && [[ !
